name: Improvements to Translation Reviewer's Workflow at Oppia
description: Google Summer of Code'23 Project with Oppia to improve workflow of Translation Reviewers at Oppia by introducing serveral full stack features.

name: Tutorials to help contributors tackle issues in new domains
description: Contractual Project to write several tutorials covering different tech domains used at Oppia to help new contributors get used to them.

name: Paint Application - Android App
description: Android Application where users can unleash their creativity using a brush on the Canvas. The Application also allows sharing and saving of the Art Piece created.
